TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordDeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 使用 PBKDF1 演算法的擴充功能，從密碼衍生金鑰。

span.span: Derives a key from a password using an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會使用 PBKDF1 演算法 PKCS #5 v2.0 標準中所定義的延伸模組，從密碼衍生適用於作為金鑰內容的位元組。This class uses an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm defined in the PKCS#5 v2.0 standard to derive bytes suitable for use as key material from a password. 標準演算法記載於 IETF RRC 2898。The standard is documented in IETF RRC 2898. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰從密碼使用類別。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以從組件中擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 反組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位編輯器，或只是開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立金鑰從密碼使用類別。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. summary.span: 從 物件衍生密碼編譯金鑰。

span.span: Derives a cryptographic key from the object.
The derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函式是 Crypto API 函式 CryptDeriveKey()，包裝函式，要提供與使用 Crypto API 的應用程式的互通性。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果`keySize`參數設為 0 位元，使用指定的演算法的預設金鑰大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used. ## Examples 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#2)]

span.span: The parameter is incorrect.
-or-

exception.span: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

span.span: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
-or-

exception.span: 參數不是有效的演算法名稱。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid algorithm name.
-or-

exception.span: 參數不是有效的雜湊演算法名稱。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid hash algorithm name.

param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

Finalize ()
!PasswordDeriveBytes ()

summary.span: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Rfc2898DeriveBytes replaces PasswordDeriveBytes for deriving key material from a password and is preferred in new applications.")

param.name: cb
param.span: 要產生的似隨機金鑰位元組數量。

span.span: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.

summary.span: 傳回似隨機金鑰位元組。

span.span: Returns pseudo-random key bytes.

returns.span: 位元組陣列，以虛擬隨機金鑰位元組填入。

span.span: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以建立任意數目的虛擬隨機位元組。This method can create any number of pseudo-random bytes. 不過，位元組序列的強度會受到雜湊輸出中的位元組數目。However, the strength of the byte sequence is limited by the number of bytes in the hash output.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

member this.Salt : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典攻擊是攻擊者嘗試藉由比較最可能的索引鍵的先前計算的加密值的加密的值解密加密的訊息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 這種攻擊會導入的密碼，才能進行金鑰衍生結尾的隨機位元組更為困難。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of random bytes at the end of the password before the key derivation. 這些隨機位元組稱為 salt。These random bytes are known as salt.

exception.span: 金鑰 salt 值固定的嘗試變更此值。

span.span: The key salt value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
Cryptographic Services
